●Indigestion vs. hunger

CONFIDENTIAL – NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION 19Finding product-market-fit and relevant metrics 
Ideally, your metrics must also be tied to your differentiation 
19●What exactly are you trying to prove at this stage? 
●What exactly are we de-risking? 
●Are these the right metrics to use now? Metrics to be used should also evolve over time 
CONFIDENTIAL – NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION 20At inception, the game isn’t to be perfect  — 
it’s to be obsessed  with the problem, 
validate ruthlessly, and build with focus. 
Avoid these traps, and you’ll save yourself 
years of pain.” 21 CONFIDENTIAL – NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION QUESTIONS?
opinion_stance: Focus on understanding problems and iterative validation rather than perfection.
